examples.example: 他用自己的一双巧手创造出了许多精美的艺术品。

translate.english: He created many exquisite artworks with his own pair of skillful hands.

examples.example: 她有一双明亮而又动人的眼睛，仿佛会说话一般。

translate.english: She has a pair of bright and charming eyes, as if they can talk.

examples.example: 她凭借自己的一双慧眼，总能发现生活中的美好。

translate.english: With her own pair of discerning eyes, she can always discover the beauty in life.
